com.ibm.disni

类 RdmaServerEndpoint<C extends RdmaEndpoint>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.disni.RdmaServerEndpoint<C>

  • public class RdmaServerEndpoint<C extends RdmaEndpoint>
extends Object
    This class represent a server endpoint. Conceptually it is similar to a server socket providing operations like bind() and accept().

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected int access 
      protected int endpointId 
      protected RdmaCmId idPriv 
      protected IbvPd pd

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      C accept()
      Extract the first connection request on the queue of pending connections.
      RdmaServerEndpoint<C> bind(SocketAddress src, int backlog)
      Bind this server endpoint to a specific IP address / port.
      void close()
      Close this endpoint.

      Deregister memory.

      Gets the local address information of this endpoint.

      Checks if is this endpoint is closed;

    • 方法详细资料

      • bind

        public RdmaServerEndpoint<C> bind(SocketAddress src,
                                  int backlog)
                           throws Exception
        Bind this server endpoint to a specific IP address / port.
        参数:
        src - (rdma://host:port)
        返回:
        the rdma server endpoint
        抛出:
        Exception - the exception

      • accept

        public C accept()
         throws IOException
        Extract the first connection request on the queue of pending connections.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

      • dispatchCmEvent

        public void dispatchCmEvent(RdmaCmEvent cmEvent)
                     throws IOException
        抛出:
        IOException

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException,
                  InterruptedException
        Close this endpoint. Destroy the Queue Pair (QP).
        抛出:
        InterruptedException
        Exception - the exception
        IOException

      • isBound

        public boolean isBound()
        Checks if is this endpoint is bound to a address;
        返回:
        true, if is bound

      • isClosed

        public boolean isClosed()
        Checks if is this endpoint is closed;
        返回:
        true, if is closed

      • getSrcAddr

        public SocketAddress getSrcAddr()
                         throws Exception
        Gets the local address information of this endpoint.
        返回:
        the local socket address.
        抛出:
        Exception - the exception

      • getIdPriv

        public RdmaCmId getIdPriv()
        Gets the RdmaCmId for this endpoint.
        返回:
        the RDMA identifier.

      • getEndpointId

        public int getEndpointId()

      • getPd

        public IbvPd getPd()

      • registerMemory

        public SVCRegMr registerMemory(ByteBuffer buffer)
                        throws IOException
        Register memory on this endpoint.
        参数:
        buffer - the buffer to be registered. The buffer needs to represent off-heap memory.
        返回:
        a stateful verb call (SVC) ready to execute the memory registration.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure
        IOException

      • deregisterMemory

        public void deregisterMemory(IbvMr mr)
                      throws IOException
        Deregister memory.
        参数:
        mr - the memory region to be de-registered.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException
